Instance.description: Base class for Civic Policies. Civic Policies are selectable things which have some ongoing game impact. The game mechanic for policy involves voting, enacting, and repealing them.

TunableTuple.name: daily_vote_random_range
TunableTuple.description: Range within which to randomize a daily vote count addition for this policy at the start of each day during the voting period. Only used if the policy is balloted.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TunableTuple.name: initial_vote_random_range
TunableTuple.description: Range within which to randomize an initial vote count for this policy at the start of the voting period. Only used if the policy is balloted.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: vote_count_statistic
Tunable.description: The statistic keeping a vote count for this policy. If not enacted, votes in this statistic would be counting toward an enactment vote. If enacted, votes would be counting toward a repeal vote.
